description: Soft garlic crammed with spices that can be used in many ways.
name: Spice-infused Garlic Confit Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cloves garlic, all peeled and sliced in half

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan to a medium-low heat with all ingredients added to the pot.
Bring to a simmer and allow to cook for 20 minutes stirring occasionally.
Remove from the heat and allow to cool to one side.
Sterilise a suitable sealable container by placing it into boiling water and allow to cool.
Empty contents of the saucepan into the container and store in the fridge overnight.
